comments.raw_text: Surely related. Contact list and online Yahoo Messenger (chatbox, messenger options menu etc) are particularly broken in FF9. But that works fine in FF12.
comments.text: Surely related. Contact list and online Yahoo Messenger (chatbox, messenger options menu etc) are particularly broken in FF9. But that works fine in FF12.

comments.raw_text: On the other hand, our bug here only manifested itself with the first 10.0a1 nightly build on Sep 28, 2011. So, bug 713014 comment #29 may actually give us some clues here!
